# CheckDisplayKey

## DisplayColumnUnrecommended

### Details

It is preferred to define the display key via the [NamingFormat](https://docs.dataminer.services/develop/schemadoc/Protocol/Protocol.Params.Param.ArrayOptions.NamingFormat.html) tag.
